title: Pisces and Pisces Compatibility: Love, Sex, and More

steps.title: As mutable water signs, a Pisces pairing makes a great couple.
steps.content: As mutable water signs, a Pisces pairing makes a great couple. Pisces are emotionally intuitive and open to change. [1] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Together, this pair can explore their deepest feelings and dreams with the knowledge that their partner will understand and accept them. Their vast imaginations will often inspire each other, and the duo often doubles as creative partners or spiritual collaborators. [2] X Research source Pisces is ruled by Neptune, the planet of dreams and the subconscious. In a relationship, Pisces is often a hopeless romantic. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. They'll do anything to make their romantic fantasies a reality and are steadfast and kind partners. [4] X Research source Pisces is also ruled by Jupiter, the planet of growth and expansion. This compels Pisces to be very open-minded to change and new experiences in relationships. [5] X Research source

steps.title: These two will understand each other's dreamy, introspective minds.
steps.content: These two will understand each other's dreamy, introspective minds. Pisces are often lost in thought, spending their time daydreaming and exploring their feelings. As a couple, they'll totally get each other's spacey ways and will be super in sync. As two sensitive souls, these two may struggle with low moods. When things get tough, they'll need to remember to take care of themselves and set emotional boundaries. [6] X Research source If one or both partners are ever feeling down, they should take some space to decompress. Journaling, venting to a friend, or calling up a trusted family member will help each partner get an outside perspective.

steps.title: This pair might need to work on voicing their desires.
steps.content: This pair might need to work on voicing their desires. Pisces is one of the most imaginative signs of the zodiac, and they usually possess an active fantasy life in the bedroom. To make these fantasies a reality, it's vital that each person speak up and talk about their needs openly. Pisces are sometimes a little shy in the beginning. To turn a Pisces/Pisces connection into a physical relationship, someone will have to be direct and make the first move.

steps.title: These two are empathetic listeners and communicators.
steps.content: These two are empathetic listeners and communicators. They'll likely enjoy talking about all things creative, from dreams to art to music, and their conversations will be illuminating. [7] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. They're always happy to hear their partner's perspective on anything and everything. Though they want to make their partner happy 100% of the time, it's important that these two stick up for themselves when disagreements come up. [8] X Research source A Pisces might go along with everything their partner wants to avoid conflict. This sign will need to remember that all relationships involve disagreements, and that they can actually be opportunities for growth.

steps.title: This pair may struggle to feel secure with each other.
steps.content: This pair may struggle to feel secure with each other. It's common for this sign to lose themselves in relationships, which can diminish their sense of confidence and self-worth. As a result, they may doubt themselves and worry that their partner doesn't actually love them. Both Pisces will benefit from cultivating an active life separate from their partner, as this will help them feel confident and comfortable trusting one another. A Pisces also might struggle to trust someone that's so similar to them, since they're well aware of their own flaws. It will be helpful for these two to remember to assume the best in each other.

steps.title: Pros:
steps.content: Pros: This pair will be so emotionally in sync that it may feel like a soulmate connection. As sensitive water signs, these two will be caring and supportive partners to one another. They'll feel safe and comfortable sharing their many dreams and desires in life, and the two will come up with some truly out-of-this-world ideas (whether that be recording an album together or secretly eloping). [9] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021.

steps.title: Cons:
steps.content: Cons: This bond runs the risk of being a little too intense. As an empathetic and loving sign, Pisces is prone to losing their individual identities in relationships. For this relationship to be healthy, it's important that these two get some space from each other sometimes to live their separate lives. That way, they'll have time to take care of their own needs and be the healthiest version of themselves in the relationship. [10] X Research source
